==[[Quenya]]==
===Noun===
#'''''tengwa''''' "letter", one of the [[tengwar]]

====Etymology====
*''teñmâ'' < [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[TEÑ]]

====Cognates====
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[têw]]''

===Verb===
#'''''tengwa''''' "to read written matter"<ref name=VT49b>{{VT|49b}}, pp. 48, 54 note 13</ref>

====Other forms<ref name=VT49b/>====
*''tengwa'' "reads" 
*''tengwëa'' "is reading" 
*''tengwane'' pa.t. "read"
*''etengwie'' "has read"
